    level="1"

    pfs="Standard"
>
[Buzzsaw Axe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1045)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

With an aerodynamic cutting edge and a curved handle, this _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)_ is perfectly suited to whirling motions, and in fact seems like it wants to whirl free from your grip. A Strike with this axe that benefits from the [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) trait's circumstance bonus on attack rolls also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll.
